request.description:
### Authentication Endpoint

This endpoint allows the client to authenticate and obtain an access token for accessing protected resources.

#### Request Body

- `username` (string) - The username for authentication.
    
- `password` (string) - The password for authentication.
    

#### Response

Upon successful authentication, the response will include an access token for accessing protected resources.

request.description:
### Update Booking Details

This endpoint allows the client to update the details of a specific booking.

#### Request Body

- `firstname` (string, required): The updated first name of the guest.
    
- `lastname` (string, required): The updated last name of the guest.
    
- `totalprice` (number, required): The updated total price of the booking.
    

#### Response

The response will indicate the success or failure of the update operation.

request.description:
# Retrieve Booking Details

This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific booking identified by the booking ID.

## Request

### Request Parameters

- `id` (path parameter) : The unique identifier of the booking.
    

### Example

```
GET https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/123

 ```

## Response

The response will be a JSON object representing the details of the booking.

### Response Body

- `bookingid` (number) : The unique identifier of the booking.
    
- `booking` (object) : Details of the booking including `firstname`, `lastname`, `totalprice`, `depositpaid`, `bookingdates`, and `additionalneeds`.
    

#### Example Response

``` json
{
    "bookingid": 123,
    "booking": {
        "firstname": "John",
        "lastname": "Doe",
        "totalprice": 500,
        "depositpaid": true,
        "bookingdates": {
            "checkin": "2022-01-01",
            "checkout": "2022-01-05"
        },
        "additionalneeds": "Breakfast"
    }
}

 ```

exec: // Save the deleted booking ID for use in next request

request.description:
### Delete Booking

This endpoint is used to delete a specific booking by providing the booking ID in the URL.

#### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

#### Response

The response will not contain a response body. The status code will indicate the success or failure of the deletion operation.

exec: pm.test("Deleted booking should not exist", function () {

item.description: > This folder includes all bookings APIs such as CreateBooking,UpdateBooking and DeleteBooking.

item.name: Ping

request.description:
This endpoint sends an HTTP GET request to retrieve a ping response from the server.

### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

### Response Body

The response will include a ping response from the server.
